body: For whoever is doing this shits, I don't know your story, on why you are uploading this "low quality" scans, but fuck you man. You're adding a number of doujinshis that is not untranslated(that's okay), but has a "low quality" word everywhere(wtf man?). I hope you stop on doing all this shit. I know it's ironic coming from me, on this generate site, to say this to you, but I will, get a life man. I hope I get to scroll without seeing any of your "low quality" uploads anymore smh. If you will continue, I hope you atleast get those "low quality" markings out. Peace bro.
